Package com.example.app.controller

Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.controller.ProductController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="*") @Validated public class ProductController extends Object
Controller class for managing products.

    • getProducts

      @GetMapping(path="/products") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ProductDTO>> getProducts(@RequestParam Integer pageNumber, @RequestParam @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") Integer pageSize, @RequestAttribute("User") User user)
      Retrieves a paginated list of products.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the paginated list of products

    • getProduct

      @GetMapping(path="/products/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProductDTO> getProduct(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Retrieves a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the product ID
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the product

      Creates a new product.
      Parameters:
      productDTO - the product to create
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

    • updateProduct

      Parameters:
      weight - the minimum weight value
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the list of products
